Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.appliance

Interface Appliance

All Superinterfaces:
Component
All Known Implementing Classes:
CircuitBreaker, Computer, Dishwasher, FlameDetector, Fridge, HomeAppliance, Kettle, Oven, Playstation, Sensor, Stove, TemperatureSensor, TV, WashingMachine
public interface Appliance extends Component
Interface for all appliances
